mapper.select: SELECT qa_no,qa_subject,om_id,TO_CHAR(qa_regdate,'YYYY-MM-DD') as dbday,qa_hit,qa_group_tab,num FROM (SELECT qa_no,qa_subject,om_id,qa_regdate,qa_hit,qa_group_tab,rownum as num FROM (SELECT qa_no,qa_subject,om_id,qa_regdate,qa_hit,qa_group_tab FROM qaboard ORDER BY qa_group_id DESC, qa_group_step ASC)) WHERE num BETWEEN ${start} AND #{end}
SELECT qa_pwd FROM qaboard WHERE qa_no=#{qa_no}
